system.description: The character removes a target's power and takes it for their own!
system.effect: The character makes an Ego attack against the grabbed target. On a success, they remove one of the target's powers and take it for their own. They can now use that power as if it was always theirs. If the power has a cost, the character must pay it or a minimum of 10 Focus. When the character uses the power, they must pay any cost normally as well.
